title: Rainy night city driving, almost stopped, pedestrian crossing
caption: Rainy night city driving, almost stopped, pedestrian crossing

description: Rainy night city driving, almost stopped, pedestrian crossing. The road is wet and slippery. The ego vehicle is driving slowly and carefully. There are several other cars on the road, some of them are also slowing down. A pedestrian is crossing the street at a crosswalk. The traffic lights are green for the ego vehicle.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly and carefully because of the rainy weather conditions. The driver is being cautious and paying attention to the pedestrian crossing the street.
